verses.verse: Moreover you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> and blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet: <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%> with cherubim <S%H3742><s%> of cunning <S%H2803><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> them.

The length <S%H753><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be eight <S%H8083><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> one of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall have one <S%H259><s%> measure. <S%H4060><s%>

The five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be coupled <S%H2266><s%> together one <S%H802><s%> to another; <S%H269><s%> and other five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be coupled <S%H2266><s%> one <S%H802><s%> to another. <S%H269><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> from the selvedge <S%H7098><s%> in the coupling; <S%H2279><s%> and likewise <S%H3651><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7020><s%> edge <S%H8193><s%> of another curtain, <S%H3407><s%> in the coupling <S%H4225><s%> of the second. <S%H8145><s%>

Fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> in the one <S%H259><s%> curtain, <S%H3407><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> in the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is in the coupling <S%H4225><s%> of the second; <S%H8145><s%> that the loops <S%H3924><s%> may take <S%H6901><s%> hold <S%H6901><s%> one <S%H802><s%> of another. <S%H269><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and couple <S%H2266><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> together with the clasps: <S%H7165><s%> and it shall be one <S%H259><s%> tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair to be a covering <S%H168><s%> on the tabernacle: <S%H4908><s%> eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall you make. <S%H6213><s%>

The length <S%H753><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of one curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits: <S%H520><s%> and the eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be all of one <S%H259><s%> measure. <S%H4060><s%>

And you shall couple <S%H2266><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and shall double <S%H3717><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> in the forefront <S%H4136><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is outmost <S%H7020><s%> in the coupling, <S%H2279><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H3924><s%> in the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> which couples <S%H2279><s%> the second. <S%H8145><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of brass, <S%H5178><s%> and put <S%H935><s%> the clasps <S%H7165><s%> into the loops, <S%H3924><s%> and couple <S%H2266><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> together, that it may be one. <S%H259><s%>

And the remnant <S%H5629><s%> that remains <S%H5736><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> the half <S%H2677><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that remains, <S%H5736><s%> shall hang <S%H5628><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the backside <S%H268><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And a cubit <S%H520><s%> on the one side, and a cubit <S%H520><s%> on the other <S%H2088><s%> side of that which remains <S%H5736><s%> in the length <S%H753><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> it shall hang <S%H1961><s%> <S%H5628><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sides <S%H6654><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> side and on that side, to cover <S%H3680><s%> it.

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of rams' <S%H352><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed red, <S%H119><s%> and a covering <S%H4372><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins. <S%H5785><s%>
And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> up.

Ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> shall be the length <S%H753><s%> of a board, <S%H7175><s%> and a cubit <S%H520><s%> and a half <S%H2677><s%> shall be the breadth <S%H7341><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>

Two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%> shall there be in one <S%H259><s%> board, <S%H7175><s%> set <S%H7947><s%> in order <S%H7947><s%> one <S%H802><s%> against <S%H413><s%> another: <S%H269><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> on the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward. <S%H8486><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards; <S%H7175><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for his two <S%H8147><s%> tenons, <S%H3027><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for his two <S%H8147><s%> tenons. <S%H3027><s%>
And for the second <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> there shall be twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards: <S%H7175><s%>

And their forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> board, <S%H7175><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> another <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>
And for the sides <S%H3411><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> boards. <S%H7175><s%>
And two <S%H8147><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> shall you make <S%H6213><s%> for the corners <S%H4742><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> in the two sides. <S%H3411><s%>

And they shall be coupled <S%H8382><s%> together beneath, <S%H4295><s%> and they shall be coupled <S%H8535><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of it to one <S%H259><s%> ring: <S%H2885><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> shall it be for them both; <S%H8147><s%> they shall be for the two <S%H8147><s%> corners. <S%H4742><s%>

And they shall be eight <S%H8083><s%> boards, <S%H7175><s%> and their sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sockets; <S%H134><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> board, <S%H7175><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> another <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood; <S%H6086><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%>

And five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> for the two sides <S%H3411><s%> westward. <S%H3220><s%>
And the middle <S%H8432><s%> bar <S%H1280><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the boards <S%H7175><s%> shall reach <S%H1272><s%> from end <S%H7097><s%> to end. <S%H7097><s%>

And you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> with gold, <S%H2091><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> their rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> for places <S%H1004><s%> for the bars: <S%H1280><s%> and you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> with gold. <S%H2091><s%>
And you shall raise <S%H6965><s%> up the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> according to the fashion <S%H4941><s%> thereof which <S%H834><s%> was showed <S%H7200><s%> you in the mount. <S%H2022><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a veil <S%H6532><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%> and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%> of cunning <S%H2803><s%> work: <S%H4639><s%> with cherubim <S%H3742><s%> shall it be made: <S%H6213><s%>

And you shall hang <S%H5414><s%> it on four <S%H702><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood overlaid <S%H6823><s%> with gold: <S%H2091><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of gold, <S%H2091><s%> on the four <S%H702><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And you shall hang <S%H5414><s%> up the veil <S%H6532><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the clasps, <S%H7165><s%> that you may bring <S%H935><s%> in thither <S%H8033><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony: <S%H5715><s%> and the veil <S%H6532><s%> shall divide <S%H914><s%> to you between <S%H996><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place and the most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>
And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat on the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> place.

And you shall set <S%H7760><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the veil, <S%H6532><s%> and the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> over <S%H5227><s%> against <S%H5227><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> toward the south: <S%H8486><s%> and you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the north <S%H6828><s%> side. <S%H6763><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> an hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and purple, <S%H713><s%> and scarlet, <S%H8144><s%> <S%H8438><s%> and fine twined <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> worked <S%H4639><s%> with needlework. <S%H4639><s%> <S%H7551><s%>

And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> for the hanging <S%H4539><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of shittim <S%H7848><s%> wood, and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold, <S%H2091><s%> and their hooks <S%H2053><s%> shall be of gold: <S%H2091><s%> and you shall cast <S%H3332><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of brass <S%H5178><s%> for them.
